thread.title: Memorex invites you to make a scene
thread.title_full: Memorex invites you to make a scene | Examiner.com

author: Kellie Speed
title: Memorex invites you to make a scene
text:
Memorex Photo used with permission from Magic Bullet Media Halloween is just a couple of weeks away, which means it’s time to unleash your inner creativity. To do just that, instead of playing dress-up, eating lots of candy and doing lots of home cooking , Memorex in partnership with the creators of SHARKNADO has created a contest inviting consumers to “make-a-scene” with actor Joey Lawrence for a once-in-a-lifetime chance to break into Hollywood.
One lucky Grand Prize winner will win a walk-on role in a 2016 production by The Asylum – the creators of SHARKNADO and Z Nation – plus a 55” 4K UHDTV, an invitation to audition for a speaking role and schedule a screenwriter pitch meeting with The Asylum producers.
The “Memorex Lives!” video contest is simple. Just visit www.memorexlives.com , and review the video clips featuring actor/singer/producer Joey Lawrence, who plays the role of superhero action star Brock Firestone, leader of “The Resistance” against The Evil Empire.
Then, film your own hilarious or haunting clips on your iPhone, webcam or Red camera and upload them into the film editor. You can enter now through December 10, 2015 and share with your friends. Ten finalists will be chosen to compete against each other by popular vote starting December 17, 2015.
The top three videos will win a prize. The Grand Prize winner will be provided transportation and accommodations for two people to Los Angeles, CA for two nights to receive their walk on role and pitch session. Airfare and rental car will be provided for those living in the 50 States and cannot be exchanged for its cash value.
The second place prize winner will receive a 42-inch Memorex CrystalVision HDTV with sound bar and subwoofer. The third place winner will receive a 32-inch Memorex CrystalVision HDTV.
For contest rules and more information, visit www.memorexlives.com .
